title: State Of The Mavs, Trade Market Options
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon to talk MacMahon’s article on the relationship between Luka Doncic and Rick Carlisle, Dallas’ desire for cultural change, the organizational decision makers in Utah and what teams may be involved in the trade market.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Desire For Cultural Change In Dallas, Utah's Decision Makers
